p: Furthermore, inhibitor 35 (Fig. 11.16) containing a β-turn inducing enediynyl amino acid moiety was prepared. The amino and carboxyl groups of this unusual amino acid were coupled to peptide sequences around the cleavage sites within the prodomain of furin. This compound inhibits furin with a K i value of 40 nM and blocks the cleavage of a fluorogenic peptide derived from the spike protein of human SARS coronavirus with an IC 50 value of 193 nM (Basak et al. 2009).
